summary: Increases and replaces all the textures on the Blades male armor to a crisp/cut up metal look at 2048x2048.
descriptionHtml:
This armour retexture is my first HD attempt.

The armour is completely rebuilt from scratch and the textures used are 2048 pixles each, making it very good for detail. 
i have optimised it also so even med spec comps can use it just fine.
====FEATURES====
-Crisp HD metal texture taken with a powerful camera.
-Diamond shaped textures from sources which are also HD and give a more samurai feel
-Dragonscales replace the engravings on the armor to suit Dragonsbane much more.

Hope you enjoy it and dont forget to give feedback!
author: Countercruel
